q: why do they want to change tires regularly
pred: Regular tire rotation is essential for maintaining the proper functioning of the vehicle's tires. Proper tire rotation helps to evenly distribute the wear and tear on the tires, which in turn extends their lifespan and improves overall vehicle performance. Additionally, rotating the tires helps to prevent uneven wear, which can lead to premature tire failure. The video shows a man changing the tires on a truck, which demonstrates the importance of proper tire maintenance for the safety and longevity of the vehicle.
